snippet: Even a little more dressed up than usual, as the de Blasios were Wednesday, it was still clear that his election marked a departure from the Bloomberg years in more ways than one.
abstract: Bill de Blasio spoke throughout his New York City mayoral campaign of a tale of two cities, where rich people live one way and everyone else another; unpretentious outfits worn by the de Blasio family members for the new mayor's inauguration ceremony reinforce message that his election signals a departure from the Bloomberg years.
lead_paragraph: Even a little more dressed up than usual, as the de Blasios were Wednesday, it was still clear that his election marked a departure from the Bloomberg years in more ways than one.

headline.main: At Inauguration, Seeing Another Sign of Change in What the First Family Wore
headline.print_headline: At Inauguration, Seeing Another Sign of Change in What the First Family Wore
